title: Strongest Champions
body:
This a list of champions who I believe are the strongest.

10. Malphite
9. Gnar
8. Warwick
7. Poppy
6. Ornn
5. Nasus
4. Galio
3. Alistar
2. Mordekaiser
1. Braum

Honorable Mentions: Renekton, Vi, Hecarim, Garen, Rengar

replies.body:
I think Renekton and Nasus surpass Warwick a lot in physical combat.

Im actually surprised Renekton in honorable mention and not in top 10 lol. 

Ornn and Galio must be higher.

I put Warwick because the guy is: a werewolf and look how huge he is compared to Renekton. Also warwick uses his bare claws and straight up tears through everyone. he has pretty much no weakness because of his unbreakable wrath. I can see the case for Ornn being higher but altho he is strong, he uses his physical to amplify his magical power. I can understand your point about Galio. However the ones above him are amplified by rage and anger. For Braum, his shield raises his strength level and Galio is made of stone and can be broken. Id like to hear other ppls ideas and maybe I missed some champs.

What do you mean with how huge he is? In cinematic, he is not that huge compare to human. 

Renekton is bigger, by a lot, IMO.

Nasus could carry the sun priest with his fingers in his ultimate from in Bloodline story. And I like to imagine Renekton is slightly larger than him.
But warwick uses his bare hands. nasus and renekton use weapons in their combat and dont use actual strength.

Nasus pulled out a barbarian's heart with bare hands.

I doubt a being of capable to fight against entire armies singlehandly is only about his weapon. 

Warwick has iron fangs btw, they are weapon.
He isnt on the list due to his story ( his lost confidence which made him weak ).

Xerath is pretty far up there. He has enough power to destroy continents if he is ever unbound. As is Sol, at the end of his lore the chains were weakening.  Bard is so powerful the universe wont even allow him to speak. Nasus and Renekton are up there, they are ascended demigods. Illaoi holds the will of Nagakabouros so she must be powerful.

I meant physical strength. Illaoi....totally forgot about her. She uses magic more tho. Id assume Sol is actually pretty strong due to his size but idk. nasus and Renekton have giant weaknesses. Nasus lost his confidence and Renekton is unfocused and insane.

Illaoi uses absolutely no magic. She only has the strength of her god. Sol literally created the Universe. Nasus and Renekton are both demigods which by definition are above mere mortals. Galio is extremely powerful. Honestly Aatrox or Rhaast should be up there. 

Malphite is the size of a mountain but many champions could destroy a mountain.

she Does use magic. thats what the tentacles are. i agree about nasus and renekton. rhaast and aatrox use dark powers and swords. not near as strong as the ones on this list. i agree with galio. my list is about super strength (mostly using bare hands which shows you dont even need weapons to be strong

Illaoi doenst use magic. She uses the strength of a literal god. Rhaast and Aaotrox are a race known as the darkin. They do not use dark powers. They are extremey powerful and change the tide of mortal history through their manipulation of war.

True true. Ill agree that Illaoi is strong but not as strong as Alistar or Galio. Those guys are virtually unbeatable and dont even need to use god powers in order to straight up crush and obliterate whole armies. Rhaast and Aatrox are indeed mighty. They do use dark powers (energy beams, possession, flight etc.) And Ill agree they are stong as well.

Illaoi is the prophet who holds the eye of god. She can test anyone most of those who you name would not survive. Alistar is a Vastayan with.... little interesting parts. Galio is only strong against magic. Galio can only move when in the presence of strong magic. Rhaast and Aatrox do not fly. They do not have energy beams. They are a race of near extinct ancient beings with the power to change time. They are by far the most terrifying creatures of all runeterra.
Im surprised Anivia isnt on the list too. or volibear.
Volibear is mostly magic and all the guys on the list would punch him out easy. Anivia has zero physical strength.
aah we talking about Raw strength then :D cause those two leaning more toward magic than anything else.

Guys most POWERFUL would be ppl like Ryze, Sol and Xerath. I am saying strongest. Like muscles, punching people, physical might. Including people who use weapons that can destroy things easy. I put Rengar and Garen because they are big strong dudes who can take down even the strongest monsters.
Interesting, truely. No Morgana or Kayle. -1
Explain. Physical strength, or overall strength?
aurelion is  num 1

Where are {{champion:136}} {{champion:127}} {{champion:203}} ?

One can destroy galaxies and forge stars, one can literally impale everything with ice in her way and one is the manifestation of death itself !

> [{quoted}](name=Zatsukino,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=cE7JBvb2,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2017-11-07T16:05:33.935+0000)
>
> Where are {{champion:136}} {{champion:127}} {{champion:203}} ?
> 
> One can destroy galaxies and forge stars, one can literally impale everything with ice in her way and one is the manifestation of death itself !

I think that the op is talking about physical strength, not magic
What’s your measure of strength, how powerful they are or how many push ups they can do?

How is Aurelion Sol not on this list?
The guy can literally create a sun and melt the planet if he wanted to.
What definition of "strong" are you using here exactly?

well since this is in story/art/sound you would assume lore


I hope lore anyways
